code_value: I travelled to Hangzhou, capital of the 12th-century Southern Song Dynasty, in the comfortable seat of a bullet train. The fast train from Shanghai has made Hangzhou a much more accessible destination for foreign tourists. Chinese have been coming here for centuries, but foreigners are now arriving at this city in greater numbers. West Lake, with its 10 classical views that have inspired poets and painters down the ages, was last year made a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
